content.rendered:
Until Next Summer

We had a blast with our Kids Corner events at Macon and Warner Robins. We’d like to thank the kids, mommies and daddies, and all of the friends and families who shared the summer with us! We are also grateful for our fantastic reader, Jennifer Tucker, and our special guests. Look for Kids Corner next summer!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Franchise Training

We trained many new franchise owners July 22-24 during our summer session. These store owners learned everything it takes to operate a Walls of Books. We are very impressed with this latest class, and we are expecting great things from Athens, GA; Washington, DC; and… well, you’ll just need to wait for further announcements about future locations!

Learn more about our franchising opportunity here.
